Reviews.Title: Great deal!!!
Reviews.Author: G.
Reviews.Content: Great deal and great price for this camera.The only one thing remains is the camera case quality less then expected.Also I thought I didn't received the second SD card and written back to the seller, they sent me another one without extra payments.

ProductInfo.Features:
Nikon D7000 16.2MP DX-Format CMOS Digital SLR with 3.0-Inch LCD - Body (Includes manufacturer's supplied accessories)
Nikon 18-105mm f/3.5-5.6 AF-S DX VR ED Nikkor Lens - Nikon 70-300mm f/4.5-5.6G ED IF AF-S VR Nikkor Zoom Lens - 5pc Dlx Lens Care & cleaning Kit
2 (Two) 16 Gigabyte SDHC Secure Digital Memory Card (Total 32GB) - Secure Digital USB Card Reader - Universal Memory Card Wallet
Well Padded Multi Compartment Gadget Bag with Pockets & Strap - Pack of LCD Screen Protectors
Full Size 59" Tripod W/Case - Jumpstart Guide to Digital SLR Cameras - BONUS!! HDMI cable for High-Definition TV Connection - Free 25 Quality Prints (Promo code # on invoice)
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon D7000 16.2MP DX-Format CMOS Digital SLR Camera 18-105mm f/3.5-5.6G ED AF-S VR DX Nikkor Zoom Lens and 70-300mm f/4.5-5.6G ED-IF AF-S "VR" Zoom Nikkor Lens + 32GB Deluxe Accessory Kit
